alert.note: Alert for Alcorn; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:39PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Itawamba, northern Lee, northeastern Monroe, southwestern Tishomingo, Prentiss and southeastern Alcorn Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 538 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Blair to near Bedford. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Booneville, Amory, Fulton, Baldwyn, Red Bay, Tombigbee State Park, Saltillo, Guntown, Belmont, Mantachie, Smithville, Jumpertown, Tremont, Thrashers, Fairview, Pratts Friendship, Hinkle, Burton and New Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Alcorn; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe; Prentiss; Tishomingo
